extension.description: This add-on bundles all TV channels from [COLORdeepskyblue]DE[/COLOR], [COLORdeepskyblue]AT[/COLOR], [COLORdeepskyblue]CH[/COLOR] or add-ons such as [COLORdeepskyblue]TVnow[/COLOR], [COLORdeepskyblue]Joyn[/COLOR], [COLORdeepskyblue]Zappn[/COLOR], [COLORdeepskyblue]PlutoTV[/COLOR] and [COLORdeepskyblue]SamsungTV[/COLOR]. These add-ons have to be installed as a dependency. Sometimes a [COLORdeepskyblue]TVnow-[/COLOR] / [COLORdeepskyblue]Joyn+ account[/COLOR] or an [COLORdeepskyblue]AT[/COLOR] / [COLORdeepskyblue]CH-IP[/COLOR] or [COLORdeepskyblue]VPN[/COLOR] is required to play the TV channels.[CR]Thanks to the addon developers: [B]Pati, knaerzche, Maven, fayer3 and SlyGuy[/B][CR][CR]Support group: [COLORdeepskyblue]https://www.facebook.com/groups/kodiunlimited[/COLOR][CR]Donation link: [COLORdeepskyblue]https://www.paypal.me/KodiUnlimited[/COLOR]
